item.title: UCSCXenaTools: Retrieve Gene Expression and Clinical Information from UCSC Xena for Survival Analysis
item.description: I thank the edition made by Stefanie Butland. The UCSC Xena platform provides an unprecedented resource for public omics data from big projects like The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA), however, it is hard for users to incorporate multiple datasets or data types, integrate the selected data with popular analysis tools or homebrewed code, and reproduce analysis procedures. To address this issue, we developed an R package UCSCXenaTools for enabling data
